summary.title: Summary
data: Passionate about crafting clean, "DRY" code, that produces quality software
Enthusiastic about contributing to open-source software

data.title: Blackjack React App
description: Blackjack card game built in React using TypeScript, React Hooks, and custom CSS
Featured in the August 29th, 2019 issue of the React.js Newsletter by Tyler McGinnis

data.title: Computer Programmer/Analyst
description: Ontario College Advanced Diploma
Graduated with High Distinction (3.90 GPA, 90% average)

data.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description: Awarded "Acerta Technical Excellence" for standardizing and adopting best practices
Architected NestJS template repository to ensure clean and consistent code across backend microservices
Pioneered and standardized automated testing with Jest, and data persistence/migrations with TypeORM, in NestJS microservices
Designed and implemented features spanning across the entire tech stack
Consumed and integrated with third party APIs such as Twilio Sendgrid
Delivered quality software every sprint in an agile/scrum environment
Actively participated in the code review process via GitHub
Responsible for screening and interviewing candidates for technical roles

data.title: Frontend Software Engineer
description: Wrote and maintained modern TypeScript code using the latest ECMAScript language features
Streamlined frontend data fetching and cashing with react-query
Delivered user interfaces for customer demos while finishing college

data.title: Backend Software Engineer Intern
description: Created RESTful APIs with OpenAPI 3.0 documentation
Wrote automated tests with Pytest for new features in Python Flask backend microservices

data.title: Frontend Software Engineer Intern
description: Led in implementing new technologies to the tech stack, including React Hooks and TypeScript
Built custom React web components that required advanced custom CSS

data.title: Programmer/Analyst (Co-op)
data.location: Waterloo Regional Police Service, Cambridge, Ontario
description: Built internal full stack web applications using the ASP.NET framework
Maintained and migrated relational databases with Microsoft SQL Server
